verses.verse: The heavens <WH8064> and the earth <WH776> were finished, <WH3615> and all their vast array. <WH6635>

On the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> God <WH430> finished <WH3615> his work <WH4399> which he had made; <WH6213> and he rested <WH7673> on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> from all his work <WH4399> which he had made. <WH6213>

God <WH430> blessed <WH1288> the seventh <WH7637> day, <WH3117> and made it holy, <WH6942> because <WH3588> he rested <WH7673> in it from all his work <WH4399> which he <WH430> had created <WH1254> and made. <WH6213>

This is the history of the generations <WH8435> of the heavens <WH8064> and of the earth <WH776> when they were created, <WH1254> in the day <WH3117> that Yahweh <WH3068> God <WH430> made <WH6213> the earth <WH776> and the heavens. <WH8064>

No plant <WH7880> of the field <WH7704> was yet <WH2962> in the earth, <WH776> and no herb <WH6212> of the field <WH7704> had yet <WH2962> sprung up; <WH6779> for <WH3588> Yahweh <WH3068> God <WH430> had not <WH3808> caused it to rain <WH4305> on the earth. <WH776> There was not <WH369> a man <WH120> to till <WH5647> the ground, <WH127>
but a mist <WH108> went up <WH5927> from <WH4480> the earth, <WH776> and watered <WH8248> the whole surface <WH6440> of the ground. <WH127>

Yahweh <WH3068> God <WH430> formed <WH3335> man <WH120> from the dust <WH6083> of <WH4480> the ground, <WH127> and breathed <WH5301> into his nostrils <WH639> the breath <WH5397> of life; <WH2416> and man <WH120> became a living <WH2416> soul. <WH5315>
Yahweh <WH3068> God <WH430> planted <WH5193> a garden <WH1588> eastward, <WH6924> in Eden, <WH5731> and there <WH8033> he put <WH7760> the man <WH120> whom <WH834> he had formed. <WH3335>

Out <WH4480> of the ground <WH127> Yahweh <WH3068> God <WH430> made <WH6779> every tree <WH6086> to grow <WH6779> that is pleasant <WH2530> to the sight, <WH4758> and good <WH2896> for food; <WH3978> the tree <WH6086> of life <WH2416> also in the middle <WH8432> of the garden, <WH1588> and the tree <WH6086> of the knowledge <WH1847> of good <WH2896> and evil. <WH7451>
A river <WH5104> went out <WH3318> of Eden <WH5731> to water <WH8248> the garden; <WH1588> and from there it was parted, <WH6504> and became four <WH702> heads. <WH7218>
The name <WH8034> of the first <WH259> is Pishon: <WH6376> this <WH1931> is the one which flows <WH5437> through the whole land <WH776> of Havilah, <WH2341> where <WH834> there is gold; <WH2091>
and the gold <WH2091> of that <WH1931> land <WH776> is good. <WH2896> There is aromatic resin <WH916> and the onyx <WH7718> stone. <WH68>
The name <WH8034> of the second <WH8145> river <WH5104> is Gihon: <WH1521> the same river that flows through <WH5437> the whole land <WH776> of Cush. <WH3568>

The name <WH8034> of the third <WH7992> river <WH5104> is Hiddekel: <WH2313> this is the one which flows in <WH1980> front <WH6926> of Assyria. <WH804> The fourth <WH7243> river <WH5104> is the Euphrates. <WH6578>
Yahweh <WH3068> God <WH430> took <WH3947> the man, <WH120> and put him <WH3240> into the garden <WH1588> of Eden <WH5731> to dress <WH5647> it and to keep it. <WH8104>
Yahweh <WH3068> God <WH430> commanded <WH6680> the man, <WH120> saying, <WH559> "Of every tree <WH6086> of the garden <WH1588> you may freely <WH398> eat; <WH398>

but of the tree <WH6086> of the knowledge <WH1847> of good <WH2896> and evil, <WH7451> you shall not eat <WH398> of it; <WH3117> for in the day that you eat <WH398> of it you will surely <WH4191> die. <WH4191>"
Yahweh <WH3068> God <WH430> said, <WH559> "It is not good <WH2896> that the man <WH120> should be <WH1961> alone; <WH6213> I will make him a helper suitable for him. <WH5828>"

Out of the ground <WH127> Yahweh <WH3068> God <WH430> formed <WH3335> every animal <WH2416> of the field, <WH7704> and every bird <WH5775> of the sky, <WH8064> and brought <WH935> them to the man <WH120> to see <WH7200> what he would call <WH7121> them. <WH120> Whatever the man called <WH7121> every living <WH2416> creature, <WH5315> that <WH1931> was its name. <WH8034>

The man <WH120> gave <WH7121> names <WH8034> to all livestock, <WH929> and to the birds <WH5775> of the sky, <WH8064> and to every animal <WH2416> of the field; <WH7704> but for man <WH120> there was not found <WH4672> a helper suitable for him. <WH5828>

Yahweh <WH3068> God <WH430> caused <WH5307> a deep sleep <WH8639> to fall <WH5307> on the man, <WH121> and he slept; <WH3462> and he took <WH3947> one <WH259> of his ribs, <WH6763> and closed up <WH5462> the flesh in its place. <WH1320>
He made <WH1129> the rib, <WH6763> which Yahweh <WH3068> God <WH430> had taken <WH3947> from the man, <WH120> into a woman, <WH802> and brought <WH935> her to the man. <WH120>

The man <WH120> said, <WH559> "This <WH2063> is now <WH6471> bone <WH6106> of my bones, <WH6106> and flesh <WH1320> of my flesh. <WH1320> She <WH2063> will be called <WH7121> <WH99999> 'woman,' because she <WH2063> was taken <WH3947> out of Man. <WH376>"
Therefore <WH3651> a man <WH376> will leave <WH5800> his father <WH1> and his mother, <WH517> and will join <WH1692> with his wife, <WH802> and they will be one <WH259> flesh. <WH1320>
They were both <WH8147> naked, <WH6174> the man <WH120> and his wife, <WH802> and were not ashamed. <WH954>
